file.name: Snowpack-3.6.0-x86_64.tar.gz
file.description: Binary package: Snowpack bundled with MeteoIO, compiled for x86_64. Compiled on Ubuntu 18.04. It is highly recommended to use Inishell to configure your simulations!

file.name: Snowpack-3.6.0-x86_64.deb
file.description: Binary package: Snowpack bundled with MeteoIO, compiled for x86_64. Compiled on Ubuntu 18.04. It is highly recommended to use Inishell to configure your simulations!

file.name: Snowpack-3.6.0-x86_64.rpm
file.description: Binary package: Snowpack bundled with MeteoIO, compiled for x86_64. Compiled on Ubuntu 18.04. It is highly recommended to use Inishell to configure your simulations!

file.name: Snowpack-3.6.0-x86_64.dmg
file.description: OsX binary package: Snowpack bundled with MeteoIO, compiled with XCode on Intel. It is highly recommended to use Inishell to configure your simulations!

file.name: Snowpack-3.6.0-x86_64.exe
file.description: Windows installer: Snowpack bundled with MeteoIO, compiled for x86_64 with gcc8.1. It is highly recommended to use Inishell to configure your simulations!

file.name: Snowpack-3.6.0-src.tar.gz
file.description: Please have a look at Getting-started for instructions. It is highly recommended to use Inishell to configure your simulations!
